show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

header.title: Untold History of the United States

title: Untold History of the United States
content: Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips look at the Untold History of the United States by Oliver Stone and Peter Kusnick. Deeply researched by an American University team of historians, the twelve-hour documentary series and accompanying book provide a provocative challenge to the status quo of American historical interpretation in the tradition of the late Howard Zinn.
